attributes.action: Make Monday 12th July an Emergency Bank Holiday
attributes.additional_details: In honour of making it to the euros final we need an emergency national holiday to celebrate this momentous occasion. Dedicating the next day to recovery and recuperation would be the ultimate sign of solidarity with our national team.
attributes.background: This is a petition for parliament to pass legislation to make Monday July 12th a national bank holiday.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
